titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on butylated hydroxyethylbenzene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/4/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on 2,6-Di-tert-butyl-4-ethylphenol (butylated hydroxyethylbenzene).
